data.system_settings: Sony XZ Premium, Android 8.0.0, Securitypatch (1. Oct. 2017)
data.actual_result: The preview freezes and reopening the inapp camera by trying to attach a new photo doesnt display any preview at all
data.expected_result: The camera should switch to the front/back camera and display the preview of it
data.short_description: Switching camera when taking a photo with the inapp camera breaks the inapp camera (only sony devices on android 7.1.1 and newer so far)
data.steps_to_repro: - click the ➕ - click the camera to open the inapp camera - try switching to the front/back camera with the top right button in the inapp camera preview
